data.message: Dearest Coke, my 7 year old son would like to know why a bottle of Coke purchased by his daddy in Belfast features this competition but is only applicable to those from England, Scotland, Wales, the Isle of Man and the Chanel Islands. Why is Northern Ireland excluded from your little marketing ploy? Especially since, unlike Scotland, the Chanel Islands and the Isle of Man, Northern Ireland will actually be featuring in the Euros. In respond of a fair and rational explanation.... Regards..//tastethefeelingeverywherebuthere🤔

replies.message: Hi Glynis, thanks for getting in touch. Unfortunately we have no control over GB stock being sold in Ireland. However, for UEFA EURO 2016™ promotions in Ireland, please visit http://spr.ly/6183BU7fd  Thanks
